author: tensorflower-gardener
message:
Stop copying test_correctness.cc files to prevent non-hermetic CUDA leakage.

`test_correctness.cc` uses RUNPATH pointed to `lit_lib`. `lit_lib` wasn't copied over, as a result, CUDA libraries were found in system-wide CUDA libs instead of hermetic CUDA repositories.

Also remove `gpu_init_impl` from the list of common deps to avoid it being added to cpu-only targets.

PiperOrigin-RevId: 797327174

files.patch:
@@ -46,9 +46,9 @@ cc_library(
 )
 
 xla_cc_binary(
-    name = "test_correctness",
+    name = "cpu_test_correctness",
     testonly = True,
-    srcs = ["test_correctness.cc"],
+    srcs = ["cpu_test_correctness.cc"],
     deps = [
         "//xla:debug_options_flags",
         "//xla:error_spec",

@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ lit_test_suite(
     hermetic_cuda_data_dir = "%S/../../../../../../../../cuda_nvcc",
     tools = [
         "//xla/backends/gpu/codegen/tools:fusion_to_mlir",
-        "//xla/backends/gpu/codegen/tools:test_correctness",
+        "//xla/backends/gpu/codegen/tools:gpu_test_correctness",
         "//xla/codegen/tools:emitters_opt",
         "@llvm-project//llvm:FileCheck",
     ],

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s
 
 fusion {
   in = f32[20,30] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s
 
 fusion {
   p0 = f32[10,11,12] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=reduce.1:0 --bijection_inputs=reduce.2:0 --bijection_outputs=reduce.1 --bijection_outputs=reduce.2
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=reduce.1:0 --bijection_inputs=reduce.2:0 --bijection_outputs=reduce.1 --bijection_outputs=reduce.2
 
 add {
   p0 = f32[] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=reduce:0 --bijection_outputs=reduce
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=reduce:0 --bijection_outputs=reduce
 
 add {
   lhs = f32[] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=reduce:0 --bijection_outputs=reduce
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=reduce:0 --bijection_outputs=reduce
 
 add {
   %p0 = f32[] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s
 
 %reducer1 {
   p0 = f32[] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s
 
 %add {
   p0 = f32[] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s
 
 add {
   lhs = u32[] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=scatter:2
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=scatter:2
 
 add {
   p0 = s4[] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=scatter:2
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=scatter:2
 
 add {
   p0 = s4[] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s
 
 fusion {
   %input = f32[100,32,64] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=transpose --bijection_outputs=transpose
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s --bijection_inputs=transpose --bijection_outputs=transpose
 
 fusion {
   %input = f32[100,32,64] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s
 
 fusion {
   %p0 = s8[160,170,3] parameter(0)

@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// RUN: test_correctness %s
+// RUN: gpu_test_correctness %s
 
 fusion {
   %input = f32[1,6400,32] parameter(0)

@@ -79,9 +79,9 @@ xla_cc_binary(
 )
 
 xla_cc_binary(
-    name = "test_correctness",
+    name = "gpu_test_correctness",
     testonly = 1,
-    srcs = ["test_correctness.cc"],
+    srcs = ["gpu_test_correctness.cc"],
     # We want to use this tool for lit tests. Due to hermetic cuda, we need to
     # set linkopts in such a way that dynamic libraries are found, which are
     # symlinked from the lit_lib directory.

@@ -27,22 +27,6 @@ copy_file(
     is_executable = True,
 )
 
-copy_file(
-    name = "cpu_test_correctness_copy",
-    testonly = True,
-    src = "//xla/backends/cpu/codegen/tools:test_correctness",
-    out = "cpu_test_correctness",
-    is_executable = True,
-)
-
-copy_file(
-    name = "gpu_test_correctness_copy",
-    testonly = True,
-    src = "//xla/backends/gpu/codegen/tools:test_correctness",
-    out = "gpu_test_correctness",
-    is_executable = True,
-)
-
 lit_test_suite(
     name = "tests",
     srcs = glob(["**/*.hlo"]),
@@ -52,9 +36,9 @@ lit_test_suite(
     hermetic_cuda_data_dir = "%S/../../../../../../cuda_nvcc",
     tools = [
         ":cpu_fusion_to_mlir_copy",
-        ":cpu_test_correctness_copy",
         ":gpu_fusion_to_mlir_copy",
-        ":gpu_test_correctness_copy",
+        "//xla/backends/cpu/codegen/tools:cpu_test_correctness",
+        "//xla/backends/gpu/codegen/tools:gpu_test_correctness",
         "//xla/codegen/tools:emitters_opt",
         "@llvm-project//llvm:FileCheck",
     ],

@@ -1068,6 +1068,7 @@ xla_cc_test(
         "//xla/service/gpu:gpu_device_info_for_tests",
         "//xla/service/gpu/kernels:custom_kernel_fusion_pattern",
         "//xla/stream_executor:device_description",
+        "//xla/stream_executor/gpu:gpu_init_impl",
         "@com_google_googletest//:gtest_main",
         "@local_tsl//tsl/platform:test",
     ],
@@ -1350,6 +1351,7 @@ xla_cc_test(
         "//xla/service/gpu:gpu_device_info_for_tests",
         "//xla/stream_executor:device_memory",
         "//xla/stream_executor:stream",
+        "//xla/stream_executor/gpu:gpu_init_impl",
         "@com_google_absl//absl/status",
         "@com_google_googletest//:gtest_main",
         "@local_tsl//tsl/platform:statusor",

@@ -53,7 +53,6 @@ _XLA_SHARED_OBJECT_SENSITIVE_DEPS = [
     Label("//xla/stream_executor:device_description_proto_cc_impl"),
     Label("//xla/stream_executor:stream_executor_impl"),
     Label("//xla/stream_executor/cuda:cuda_compute_capability_proto_cc_impl"),
-    Label("//xla/stream_executor/gpu:gpu_init_impl"),
     Label("//xla/backends/cpu/runtime:thunk_proto_cc_impl"),
     "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf",
     "//xla/tsl/framework:allocator_registry_impl",
